page.title: 17HAIR STYLES IN WIVELISCOMBE
page.content: We interviewed a lady from a local salon which employs several ex-Kingsmead girls.Over the last five years fashion has changed a lot,from longer to shorter styles.The most popular styles today are layered bobs and short spikey hair. The salon has 80-100 customers a week numbers having increased over the last few years.Most people who have their hair dyed are having blonde dye or high lights or brown dye low lights to cover up grey hair.Occasionally people moan about how things turn out. Apprentice hairdressers have to train for three years and then take an exam to qualify. The salon hasn't styled any punk heads yet.Some children get it done in Taunton but often you find that they have done it themselves or with friends.
